001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.util.Log;
005import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
006import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
008import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
010import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
012import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
013import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Game;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service.CodebreakerRepository;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service.PreferencesRepository;
018import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
019import java.util.stream.Collectors;
020import java.util.stream.Stream;
021import javax.inject.Inject;
022
023@HiltViewModel
024public class CodebreakerViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
025
026  private static final String TAG = CodebreakerViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
027
028  private final CodebreakerRepository codebreakerRepository;
029  private final PreferencesRepository preferencesRepository;
030  private final MutableLiveData<Game> game;
031  private final LiveData<Boolean> inProgress;
032  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
033  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
034  private final String pool;
035  private final String codeLengthKey;
036  private final int codeLengthDefault;
037
038  @Inject
039  CodebreakerViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context,
040      CodebreakerRepository codebreakerRepository, PreferencesRepository preferencesRepository) {
041    this.codebreakerRepository = codebreakerRepository;
042    this.preferencesRepository = preferencesRepository;
043    game = new MutableLiveData<>();
044    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
045    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
046    inProgress = Transformations.map(game, (game) -> game != null && !game.isSolved());
047    pool = Stream.of(context.getResources().getStringArray(R.array.color_names))
048        .map((name) -> name.substring(0, 1))
049        .collect(Collectors.joining());
050    codeLengthKey = context.getString(R.string.code_length_key);
051    codeLengthDefault = context.getResources().getInteger(R.integer.code_length_default);
052    startGame();
053  }
054
055  public void startGame() {
056    throwable.setValue(null);
057    int length = preferencesRepository.get(codeLengthKey, codeLengthDefault);
058    Game game = new Game(pool, length);
059    codebreakerRepository
060        .startGame(game)
061        .subscribe(
062            this.game::postValue,
063            this::postThrowable,
064            pending
065        );
066  }
067
068  public void resumeGame(String id) {
069    throwable.setValue(null);
070    codebreakerRepository
071        .getGame(id)
072        .subscribe(
073            game::postValue,
074            this::postThrowable,
075            pending
076        );
077  }
078
079  public void submitGuess(String text) {
080    throwable.setValue(null);
081    codebreakerRepository
082        .submitGuess(text)
083        .subscribe(
084            (guess) -> game.postValue(game.getValue()),
085            this::postThrowable,
086            pending
087        );
088  }
089
090  public LiveData<Game> getGame() {
091    return game;
092  }
093
094  public LiveData<Boolean> getInProgress() {
095    return inProgress;
096  }
097
098  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
099    return throwable;
100  }
101
102  @Override
103  public void onStop(@NonNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
104    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
105    pending.clear();
106  }
107
108  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
109    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
110    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
111  }
112
113}
